title: Machines and the farm
creator_credit: Random House and Agricultural Engineers Association
brief_description: A demonstration of the wide variety of agricultural equipment produced in Britain, and a review of the increasing efficiency of farm machinery. Illustrations include combine sowers and harvesters; fertilizers; irrigation pipes and sprays; muck spreaders; pea harvesters; and precision planting machines. Equipment of the future is exemplified in remotely controlled electronic tractors.
